name: Find the most foreign licence plate.
description:
Time: 5 minutes
Find the licence plate from the state or province the furthest away.
Distance is measured from the capital of the region the licence plate is from.

name: Drink espresso on the go
description: One team member must drink a shot of espresso.

name: Find the most expensive car.
description:
Time: 5 minutes.
Price is measured by ticket price advertised by the car company.

name: Find the most expensive item
description:
5 minutes.
The item must have an advertised price e.g. a price tag or sticker
The item must be something a person can carry in one hand
The item cannot be access to or information about something else, e.g. a key or a gift card

name: Get wet
description: At least one team member must be in water at least 30cm deep

name: Share an embarrassing fact
description:
5 minutes
One team member must share an embarrassing fact about themselves with the chat.
The non-participating teams will vote on which is the most embarrassing.

name: Play catch
description:
Choose an object. Throw that object at least 10 metres between team members 5 times in a row without the object touching the ground. 
Once you have chosen, you may not change objects.

name: Find a mushroom
description: Find a naturally growing mushroom. First team to send images of a mushroom wins.

name: Photograph the most birds
description:
10 mins
Each picture must be of a different bird.
The birds must be real and alive.

name: Visit something mid
description: Visit something with an exactly 3.5 stars rating on google.

name: Drink a beer in the park
description: Acquire a beer. While in a park, completely drink the beer (non-alcoholic beer is acceptable).

name: Find something interesting.
description:
10 mins
Visit something that has a Wikipedia article. The Wikipedia article with the longest body section (by number of words) wins.

name: Visit something excellent
description:
5 mins
Visit something with a rating on google maps. Highest rated thing wins.
In the case of a tie, the thing with the most ratings wins.

name: Get wet.
description: One team member must get into water that is at least a foot deep.

name: Flip a bottle.
description:
Flip a bottle, causing it to land on its lid and remain upright for at least 1 second.
Your flip must start with the bottle upright.
The bottle must have a screw top.

name: Flip 5 heads in a row.
description: Flip a heads five times in a row using a real Canadian coin. The flip must be fair.
